New Records: Oliver Baumann's key save on Xavi's long range effort edges him ahead of Alex Nübel's performance on Friday, making him Germany's new #1
Key Match Events: Leweling made it 1-0 with a goal in the 63rd minute
Leweling's goal was initially ruled offside by VAR but was later allowed
Pre-Game Insights: Germany were missing many first-team players due to injuries
Nagelsmann made changes to the lineup with Angelo Stiller and Aleksandar Pavlović in midfield, and Leweling replacing Deniz Undav
Post-Match Reflections: Julian Nagelsmann praised the team's performance, calling it a masterclass despite the lack of goals
The team's defensive performance was highlighted as a key factor in the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Allianz Arena in front of a crowd of 75,000
Germany's next match is against Bayern Munich on Saturday
